2882.description: An Act To Revise Provisions Pertaining To Guardianships And Conservatorships; To Amend Section 93-20-125, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise Transition And Conflict Of Law Provisions; To Amend Section 93-20-431, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Relating To Payment Of Settlement Proceeds Without Appointment Of A Conservator; And For Related Purposes.

2883.title: Seventh Circuit; additional ADA's.
2883.description: An Act To Amend Section 25-31-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Number Of Legal Assistants For The Seventh Circuit Court District; And For Related Purposes.

2884.title: Fresh Start Act; remove limitations on the applicability of.
2884.description: An Act To Amend Sections 73-77-5, 73-77-7 And 73-77-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Remove The Limitations On Applicability From The Provisions Of Fresh Start Act; And For Related Purposes.

2885.title: Mississippi Prepaid Affordable College Tuition Program; revise comprehensive investment plan and investment options for.
2885.description: An Act To Amend Section 37-155-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Mississippi Prepaid Affordable College Tuition Program By Revising The Comprehensive Investment Plan And Investment Policies To Be Utilized By The Board Of Directors Of The College Savings Plans Of Mississippi Trust Funds In Its Administration Of The Mississippi Prepaid Affordable College Tuition Trust Fund; And For Related Purposes.

2886.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist Alcorn State University in paying the costs of various projects.
2886.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Assist Alcorn State University In Paying The Costs Associated With Various Projects And Programs; And For Related Purposes.

2887.title: Bonds; authorize issuance for repair and renovation of Cotesworth Culture and Heritage Center in Carrollton.
2887.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist In Paying The Costs Associated With The Repair And Renovation Of Cotesworth Culture And Heritage Center In Carrollton, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

2888.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist Yalobusha County to demolish and replace Gum's Crossing Bridge on County Road 221.
2888.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist Yalobusha County, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Associated With The Demolition And Replacement Of The Damaged Gum's Crossing Bridge On County Road 221; And For Related Purposes.

2889.title: Greene County; extend repeal date on assessments in justice court.
2889.description: An Act To Amend Section 1, Chapter 940, Local And Private Laws Of 2009, As Last Amended By Chapter 922, Local And Private Laws Of 2016, To Extend The Date Of Repeal From July 1, 2020, To July 1, 2024, On The Provision Of Law That Authorizes The Board Of Supervisors Of Greene County, Mississippi, To Assess A Certain Fee For Any Civil Case Filed And Any Misdemeanor Conviction Obtained In The Justice Court Of The County To Fund Certain Maintenance And Construction Needs Of The Greene County Justice Court Complex; And For Related Purposes.

2890.title: Coahoma County; allow board to withdraw funds from trust for equipping justice/jail/E911 complex and central fire station.
2890.description: An Act To Amend Chapter 912, Local And Private Laws Of 2013, As Last Amended By Chapter 918, Local And Private Laws Of 2019, Which Establishes The Coahoma County Reserve And Trust Fund, To Authorize The Coahoma County Board Of Supervisors, Which Is The Trustee Of The Fund, To Use A Certain Amount Of The Fund To Pay The Costs Associated With The Equipping Of The Justice Complex, Jail Facility And E911 Facility, And Of The Central Fire Station, Located In The County; And For Related Purposes.

2891.title: Bolivar County; authorize board of supervisors to contribute to the Bolivar County Community Action Agency, Inc.
2891.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Bolivar County, Mississippi, To Contribute Funds To The Bolivar County Community Action Agency, Inc.; And For Related Purposes.

2892.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist Perry County in paying the costs of improvements to its industrial park.
2892.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist Perry County, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Associated With Certain Improvements To The Perry County Industrial Park; And For Related Purposes.

2893.title: Bonds; authorize issuance for construction of permanent facility for 3-D School for children with dyslexia.
2893.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The 3-d School For Children With Dyslexia In Paying The Costs Associated With The Construction Of A Permanent Facility For Its Pine Belt Campus In Petal, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

2894.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist City of Mendenhall to construct a water line from a new, unused water tank to the city.
2894.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Mendenhall, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Associated With The Construction Of A Water Line From A New, Unused Water Tank To The City For Purposes Of Utilizing The Water System; And For Related Purposes.

2895.title: Sales tax; exempt sale of groceries.
2895.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-111, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From The State Sales Tax Sales Of Food And Beverages, Other Than Beer And Light Wine, In Supermarkets, Grocery Stores, Convenience Stores, Dollar Stores, Drugstores And Farmers' Markets; And For Related Purposes.

2896.title: Ad valorem taxes; exempt real property and motor vehicles in an area annexed by a municipality for 12 months after annexation.
2896.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-31-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Ad Valorem Taxation All Real Property Located In An Area Annexed By A Municipality, For A Period Of 12 Months After The Date Of Annexation; To Amend Section 27-51-41, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Ad Valorem Taxation All Motor Vehicles Registered To An Address In An Area Annexed By A Municipality, For A Period Of 12 Months After The Date Of Annexation; And For Related Purposes.

2898.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist in renovation of building for Hinds Community College/City of Pearl Workforce Training Center.
2898.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist In Paying The Costs Associated With The Renovation Of A Building To House The Hinds Community College/city Of Pearl Workforce Training Center In Pearl, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

2899.title: Bonds; authorize to assist in improvements to facilities to house Concourse Workforce Training Center in Batesville.
2899.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist In Paying Costs Associated With The Repair, Renovation And Other Improvements To Buildings And Related Facilities In The City Of Batesville, Mississippi, To House The Concourse Workforce Training Center; And For Related Purposes.

2900.title: Tobacco tax; define tobacco products to include electronic smoking devices for purposes of 15% excise tax.
2900.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-69-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Define The Terms "electronic Smoking Device" And "tobacco Product" For Purposes Of Including Electronic Smoking Devices In The 15% Excise Tax On Tobacco Products Other Than Cigarettes; To Amend Sections 27-69-13, 27-69-15 And 27-69-27, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; And For Related Purposes.

2901.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist in restoration and renovation of Scott Ford Midwife Houses in downtown Jackson.
2901.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist In Paying The Costs Associated With The Restoration And Renovation Of The Scott Ford Midwife Houses In Downtown Jackson, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

2902.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist in renovation and expansion of George Regional Health System in Lucedale.
2902.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist In Paying The Costs Associated With The Renovation And Expansion Of George Regional Health System In Lucedale, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

2903.title: Bonds; authorize issuance for Phase II of construction of a new headquarters building for the Department of Public Safety.
2903.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For Phase Ii Of Construction, Furnishing And Equipping Of A New Headquarters Building For The Department Of Public Safety; And For Related Purposes.

2904.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist Quitman County pay costs of repair and restoration of county courthouse.
2904.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist Quitman County, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Associated With The Repair And Restoration Of The Quitman County Courthouse; And For Related Purposes.

2905.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist in upgrades to Kansas City Southern Rail Line south of Meridian.
2905.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist In Paying The Costs Associated With Upgrades To The Kansas City Southern Rail Line South Of Meridian, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

2906.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist Town of Terry in paying costs of constructing a community center and storm shelter.
2906.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The Town Of Terry, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Associated With The Construction Of A Community Center And Storm Shelter; And For Related Purposes.

2907.title: Taxpayer Pay Raise Act; remove phase out of income & franchise tax & remove deduction of federal employment tax.
2907.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-7-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Remove The Provisions That Phase Out, Beginning January 1, 2018, Income Taxation On The First $5,000.00 Of Taxable Income; To Amend Section 27-7-18, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Remove A Provision That Authorizes A Portion Of The Federal Self-employment Taxes Assessed Against Self-employed Individuals To Be Allowed As An Adjustment To Gross Income Under The State Income Tax Law; To Amend Sections 27-13-5 And 27-13-7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Remove The Provisions That Phase Out, Beginning January 1, 2018, The Corporation Franchise Tax; To Repeal Section 5, Chapter 499, Laws Of 2016, Which Repeals The Corporation Franchise Law From And After January 1, 2028; And For Related Purposes.

2908.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist in renovation and expansion of Greene County Rural Events Center in Leakesville.
2908.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist In Paying The Costs Associated With The Renovation And Expansion Of The Greene County Rural Events Center In Leakesville, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

2909.title: City of Hattiesburg; correct errors referencing county instead of city, and extend repealer on tourism tax and commission.
2909.description: An Act To Amend Chapter 878, Local And Private Laws Of 1990, As Last Amended By Chapter 922, Local And Private Laws Of 2017, Which Creates The Hattiesburg Tourism Commission And Authorizes A Tax On The Gross Proceeds Of Hotels And Motels From Overnight Room Rentals To Fund The Commission, To Correct Certain Errors Referencing The County Instead Of The City; To Extend Until July 1, 2022, The Repeal Date Of The Act; And For Related Purposes.

2910.title: Warren County; authorize to contribute funds to certain organizations.
2910.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Warren County, Mississippi, To Contribute To The Warren, Washington, Issaquena, Sharkey Community Action Agency, The Women's Restoration Shelter Of Mountain Of Faith Ministries, We Care Community Services, Inc., The Vicksburg Family Development Service, Triumph Ministries, Inc., And Central Mississippi Prevention Services, Inc.; And For Related Purposes.

2912.title: City of West Point; extend repealer on authority to levy tax on hotels, motels and restaurants.
2912.description: An Act To Amend Chapter 957, Local And Private Laws Of 2012, As Amended By Chapter 939, Local And Private Laws Of 2016, To Extend The Date Of Repeal From July 1, 2020, To July 1, 2024, On The Provision Of Law That Authorizes The Governing Authorities Of The City Of West Point, Mississippi, To Levy A Tax Upon The Gross Proceeds Of Sales Of Hotels And Motels Derived From Room Rentals And Upon The Gross Proceeds Of Sales Of Restaurants; And For Related Purposes.

2914.title: Law Enforcement Officer Bulletproof Vest Grant Fund; create and issue bonds to fund.
2914.description: An Act To Create A Special Fund In The State Treasury To Be Designated As The Law Enforcement Officer Bulletproof Vest Grant Fund; To Provide That The Expenditure Of Money Deposited In The Fund Shall Be Under The Direction Of The Department Of Public Safety; To Provide That Money In The Fund Shall Be Made Available To Local Law Enforcement Agencies By The Department Of Public Safety To Be Used As A Match For Federal Grant Funds To Purchase Bulletproof Vests For Law Enforcement Officers; To Provide That Only Law Enforcement Agencies Having A Bulletproof Vest Policy For Law Enforcement Officers Employed By The Agency Are Eligible To Receive Money From The Fund; To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For The Law Enforcement Officer Bulletproof Vest Grant Fund; And For Related Purposes.

2916.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist City of Collins in construction of frontage road connection.
2916.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Collins, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Associated With The Construction Of A Frontage Road Connection Between Popeye's And Sullivan Motors; And For Related Purposes.

2917.title: Bonds; authorize issuance of general obligation bonds to assist City of West in repair and renovation of city park.
2917.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of West, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Associated With The Repair And Renovation Of Its City Park; And For Related Purposes.

2919.title: Bonds; authorize issuance of general obligation bonds to assist City of Pickens in repair and renovation of library.
2919.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Pickens, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Associated With The Repair And Renovation Of Its Library; And For Related Purposes.

2920.title: Bonds; authorize issuance of general obligation bonds to assist City of Canton to alleviate flooding.
2920.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Canton, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Associated With The Alleviation Of Flooding; And For Related Purposes.

2921.title: Bonds; authorize issuance of general obligation bonds to assist City of Carthage in repair and renovation of coliseum.
2921.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Carthage, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Associated With The Repair And Renovation Of Its Coliseum; And For Related Purposes.

2922.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist City of Canton in preplanning and first phase of city complex.
2922.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Canton, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Associated With The Preplanning And First Phase Of A City Complex To House Administration, The Police Department And The Fire Department; And For Related Purposes.

2923.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist in bridge repairs and trail overlay repairs on Longleaf Trace.
2923.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist In Paying The Costs Associated With Bridge Repairs And Trail Overlay Repairs On The Longleaf Trace Between Hattiesburg, Mississippi, And Prentiss, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

2924.title: Restore suffrage to Robert Warren.
2924.description: An Act To Restore The Right Of Suffrage To Robert Warren Of Sharkey County, Mississippi.

2925.title: City of Vicksburg; authorize city to adopt ordinance to permit motor-assisted scooters to operate on certain city streets.
2925.description: An Act To Authorize The Governing Authorities Of The City Of Vicksburg, Mississippi, To Designate By Ordinance The Roads And Streets, Together With Sidewalks And Bicycle Paths And Lanes, Upon Which Motor-assisted Scooters May Be Operated; And For Related Purposes.

2926.title: City of Vicksburg; authorize to contribute to the Read by Third Grade Tutorial Program.
2926.description: An Act To Authorize The Governing Authorities Of The City Of Vicksburg, Mississippi, To Contribute To The Read By Third Grade Tutorial Program; And For Related Purposes.

2927.title: City of Vicksburg; authorize to contribute funds to the American Legion Auxiliary Girls State Program.
2927.description: An Act To Authorize The Governing Authorities Of The City Of Vicksburg, Mississippi, To Contribute To The American Legion Auxiliary Girls State Program; And For Related Purposes.

2928.title: City of Winona; extend repealer on authority to levy tax on restaurants.
2928.description: An Act To Amend Chapter 952, Local And Private Laws Of 2016, To Extend The Repeal Date From July 1, 2020, To July 1, 2024, On The Law That Authorizes The City Of Winona To Impose A Tax Upon The Gross Proceeds Of The Sales Of Restaurants; And For Related Purposes.

2929.title: Local governmental entities and school districts; authorize grant of admin leave with pay in certain disasters or emergencies.
2929.description: An Act To Authorize Local Governmental Entities And Local School Districts To Grant Administrative Leave With Pay To The Employees Of Those Local Governmental Entities And Local School Districts In The Event Of Certain Disasters Or Emergencies; And For Related Purposes.

2930.title: Appropriation; IHL - Subsidiary programs.
2930.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For Support Of The Eight Universities' Designated Institutes, Laboratories And Programs For Which They Are Responsible And The Executive Office Of The Board Of Trustees For Fiscal Year 2021; And For Related Purposes.

2931.title: Appropriation; IHL - Student Financial Aid.
2931.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Support And Maintenance Of Financial Aid Scholarship, Loan And Grant Programs And The Mississippi Office Of Student Financial Aid, For Fiscal Year 2021.

2932.title: Appropriation; IHL - University of Mississippi Medical Center.
2932.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The University Of Mississippi Medical Center For Fiscal Year 2021.

2933.title: Appropriation; IHL - Alcorn State - Agricultural programs.
2933.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Support And Maintenance Of The Alcorn State University Agricultural Programs For Fiscal Year 2021.

2934.title: Appropriation; IHL - Mississippi State University - Agricultural and Forestry Experiment Station.
2934.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Support And Maintenance Of The Mississippi Agricultural And Forestry Experiment Station For Fiscal Year 2021.

2935.title: Appropriation; IHL - Mississippi State University - Cooperative Extension Service.
2935.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Support And Maintenance Of The Mississippi Cooperative Extension Service For Fiscal Year 2021.

2936.title: Appropriation; IHL - Mississippi State University - Forest and Wildlife Research Center.
2936.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Incurred In The Maintenance And Operation Of The Forest And Wildlife Research Center For Fiscal Year 2021.

2937.title: Appropriation; IHL - Mississippi State University - Veterinary Medicine, College of.
2937.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The College Of Veterinary Medicine At Mississippi State University For Fiscal Year 2021.

2938.title: Appropriation; Community and Junior Colleges Board - Administrative expenses.
2938.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Administrative Expenses Of The Mississippi Community College Board For Fiscal Year 2021.

2939.title: Appropriation; Community and Junior Colleges Board - Support for community and junior colleges.
2939.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Aid And Support Of The Public Community And Junior Colleges Of The State Of Mississippi For Fiscal Year 2021.

2940.title: Appropriation; Corrections, Department of.
2940.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Support And Maintenance Of The Mississippi Department Of Corrections For Fiscal Year 2021.

2941.title: Appropriation; Public Safety, Department of.
2941.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To Defray The Expenses Of The Department Of Public Safety For Fiscal Year 2021.

2942.title: Appropriation; Emergency Management Agency.
2942.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To Defray The Expenses Of The Mississippi Emergency Management Agency, And For The Purpose Of Establishing A Disaster Relief Reserve Fund And Defraying The Costs Related To Certain Disaster Assistance Programs For Fiscal Year 2021.

2943.title: Appropriation; Military Department.
2943.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Mississippi National Guard For Fiscal Year 2021.

2944.title: Appropriation; Veterans Affairs Board.
2944.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Veterans Affairs Board For Fiscal Year 2021.

2945.title: Appropriation; Judicial Performance Commission.
2945.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Commission On Judicial Performance Of The State Of Mississippi For The Fiscal Year 2021.

2946.title: Appropriation; Ethics Commission.
2946.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To Defray The Expenses Of The Mississippi Ethics Commission For The Fiscal Year 2021.

2970.description: An Act Making An Appropriation Of Special Funds To Defray The Expenses Of The Mississippi Fair Commission, The Mississippi Livestock Coliseum, And The Industrial Showcase And Trade Mart Building For Fiscal Year 2021.

2971.title: Appropriation; Department of Agriculture and Commerce - Livestock shows.
2971.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The State Department Of Agriculture And Commerce For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Dixie National Livestock Show; A Roundup For Junior Exhibitors Of Livestock And Goats; Supplemental Funds For Livestock Premiums; County Livestock Shows In Offering And Paying Prizes Or Awards To Competitors In Approved County Livestock Shows; The Five District Livestock Shows; The Five State Dairy Shows; The Mississippi High School Rodeo; And To Provide How Said Money Shall Be Paid Out Of The State Treasury For Fiscal Year 2021.

2974.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For Expenses Of The Executive Department, Being The Governor's Office And Staff, And For Expenses Incidental To The Proper Operation Of The Governor's Mansion And Residence Of The Governor For Fiscal Year 2021.

2975.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The State Department Of Audit For Fiscal Year 2021.

2976.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Mississippi Department Of Information Technology Services For Fiscal Year 2021.

2977.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To Defray The Expenses Of The State Personnel Board For Fiscal Year 2021.

2979.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To Defray The Expenses Of The State Treasurer's Office For Fiscal Year 2021.
